page.title: 10SPORTS IN HELMSHORE.
page.content:
There are quite a lot of places where you can do sports around Helmshore. You can go to the{Sports Centre}where you can do almost every sport and afterwards you can go to the bar upstairs and have a drink, or watch television. There is also the swimming baths. It is quite cheap to get in and if you want you can just watch. You can also have swimming lessons. You can go to the cricket club where you can practice, play cricket or just sit and watch. You can go horse riding as well. There is Rossendale golf course where you can have coaching or just have a game of golf.
So there is quite a lot to do if you like sport.
